name: Kaldicoin
description: Kaldicoin™ is a cryptocurrency associated with KaldiMarket™, designed to transform the global coffee trade. It's minted based on actual coffee sales done in the US dollar, rewarding both farmers and buyers within the ecosystem as an added reward layer. Aimed at redistributing value in the coffee supply chain, Kaldicoin promotes equitable economic participation and aligns the interests of all stakeholders in the marketplace.
